Improvements.Description: Instead of just printing stack trace, handle exceptions more effectively by logging them or throwing them to be handled by the caller. Empty catch blocks are a bad practice as they hide the error and make debugging difficult.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (i=0; i < 50 && !inited; i++) {
+ for (i=0; i < MAX_ATTEMPTS && !inited; i++) {
Improvements.Description: Magic numbers are values with unexplained meaning. Replace magic numbers with named constants for readability and maintainability.
